H0.text: How many symphonies did Jean Sibelius compose. 3

H1.text: How many symphonies did Jean Sibelius compose. 5

H2.text: How many symphonies did Jean Sibelius compose. 6

H3.text: How many symphonies did Jean Sibelius compose. 7

A4.text: The core of his oeuvre is his set of seven symphonies, which, like his other major works, are regularly performed and recorded in Finland and countries around the world.

A5.text: The year 1926 saw a sharp and lasting decline in Sibelius's output: after his Seventh Symphony, he produced only a few major works during the rest of his life.
